Talks & Presentations

Conference Presentations

2024

2023

  • INTERSPEECH 2023 - Privacy-Preserving Dementia Classification with Differential Privacy [Paper]

2022

2020

  • SPCOM 2020 - Speech task-based automatic classification of ALS and Parkinson’s Disease [Video]

2019

2018
